at some point ws becomes rs on the brim fingering weight yarn lichen and lace 1 ply superwash merino fingering 369 m 400 yds /100 gr used approx 90gr 332m for model hook 3 00 mm gauge 26 single_crochet & 36 row = 10 cm 4 over single_crochet rib pattern substitutions look for yarn with knit gauge of 28 sts on 3 mm needles parallelogram chain 87 setup row ws working into bumps on ws of foundation chain skip 1st chain single_crochet in each rem chain chain 1 & turn 86 sts working in single_crochet rib pattern row 1 rs skip 1st st single_crochet in each st till 1 st rem make 2 single_crochet in final st chain 1 & turn row 2 ws make 2 single_crochet in 1st st single_crochet in each st till 2 sts rem decrease chain 1 & turn repeat row 1 & 2 another 45 times repeat row 1 once more do not chain 1 at end of row turn 94 row total join parallelogram into a tube as per above instructions crown from now on insert hook into both loops of st when making a single_crochet you re working in a spiral do not join with slip_stitch at end of round copyright by entrelac cat updated october 2023 crochet biased beanie page 3 of 7 round 1 single_crochet in same st as final slip_stitch single_crochet in end of each row around the circle squeeze in 1 more single_crochet before the beg chain of the round you should have 96 sts round 2 work even round 3 *decrease single_crochet in next 6 sts repeat from * to end of round 84 sts round 4 work even round 5 *decrease single_crochet in next 5 sts repeat from * to end of round 72 sts round 6 work even round 7 *decrease single_crochet in next 4 sts repeat from * to end of round 60 sts round 8 work even round 9 *decrease single_crochet in next 3 sts repeat from * to end of round 48 sts round 10 work even round 11 *decrease single_crochet in next 2 sts repeat from * to end of round 36 sts round 12 work even round 13 *decrease single_crochet in next st repeat from * to end of round 24 sts round 14 work even round
